sentences.en: Agriculture forms the backbone of the rural economy.
sentences.cn: 农业是农村经济的基础。

sentences.en: By September, the backbone of Japanese resistance had been broken.
sentences.cn: 到了九月, 日军抵抗的主力已经崩溃.

sentences.en: Farmers are the backbone of this community.
sentences.cn: 农场主是这个团体的中坚力量。

sentences.en: He has no backbone ; when things get difficult, he gives in.
sentences.cn: 他性格软弱,一 遇 困难, 便放弃.

sentences.en: He is a man of backbone.
He'll do whatever anybody says . He has no backbone.
sentences.cn: 别人让他做什么他就做, 他一点没骨气.

sentences.en: His sister had the backbone to stand up to him.
sentences.cn: 他姐姐有勇气和他对着干.

sentences.en: More and more people are deciding that political power must be the backbone of every new advance.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人认为,政治权力是每前进一步的保证.

sentences.en: Petty officers are the backbone of a navy.
Standing up to bullies takes plenty of backbone.
sentences.cn: 勇敢地对付暴徒需有大无畏精神.

sentences.en: The backbone is an articulate structure.
sentences.cn: 脊椎骨是一种关节相连的结构.

sentences.en: The sweat broke out on his backbone.
The wounded soldiers showed much backbone before the enemy.
sentences.cn: 受伤的士兵在敌人面前表现出了威武不屈的精神.

sentences.en: They are the backbone of the factory.
sentences.cn: 他们是这个厂的顶梁柱.

sentences.en: You might be taking drastic measures and you've got to have the backbone to do that.
sentences.cn: 你也许要采取极端的措施，你必须有勇气那么做。

trans.tran_cn: 脊梁骨，脊椎，分水岭，支柱，决心，毅力
trans.tran_en: the row of connected bones that go down the middle of your back
